Mr. Speaker, I rise in support of H.R. 655, the Dalles Watershed  Development Act, introduced by my colleague from the Pacific Northwest,  Representative Bentz from Oregon.

This bill would direct the Secretary of Agriculture to convey  approximately 150 acres of Federal land in the Mount Hood National  Forest to the City of The Dalles,…

Mr. HURD of Colorado.  655, the bill now under  consideration.

Mr. Speaker, I rise today in strong support of H.R. 655, sponsored by  my colleague, Representative Bentz.

This straightforward legislation would transfer 150 acres of U.S.  Forest Service land to the City of The Dalles, Oregon.
